thread.section_title: Speke Resort and Conference Centre - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice place
thread.title_full: Nice place - Review of Speke Resort and Conference Centre, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: chikuk14
title: Nice place
text: Sundays at speke resort is full of fun and entertainment for all. Many people comes,some come for swimming,for horse ride,boat trip,many people comes at lakeside to have the famous whole fish and muchomos. Live Dj at lakeside, face Painting, jumping castle and lots more.Come to speke resort on Sunday with family you will enjoy the place.
